collaborativeProjects.title: AI I Spy
description: An AI-powered version of the game I Spy, created by integrating two different publicly available AI models. I built this as part of a set of AI-based tools created with a classmate to entertain children, as the final project for the AI in Modern Software Development class at SLU.

collaborativeProjects.title: TPEN Services
description: Node.js back end for TPEN project helping organize data for humanities researchers.
I contributed as part of simulated Agile app development environment for senior capstone project. Contributions added include added API endpoints and comprehensive unit testing.

collaborativeProjects.title: Gallery of Glosses
description: Front end Next.js TypeScript web app for presenting research data to theological scholars.

collaborativeProjects.title: Pi4Micronaut
description: Java library with Micronaut framework to facilitate IoT interaction with Raspberry Pis.

I contributed as part of simulated Agile app development environment for senior capstone project. I helped add support for numerous GPIO hardware components, wrote unit tests, wrote documentation, and performed hardware testing.

individualProjects.title: Flow for Spotify
description: A tool to reorder a diverse playlist for the smoothest transition between each genre and style. Find your playlist's perfect flow.

individualProjects.title: Music Blog
description: Music blog as the final project for CSCI 4360 Web Technologies.
